 Sydney Water Corporation - WS4612680790 - SCADA and Related Electrical Services
 https://www.tenders.nsw.gov.au/wsroc/?event=public.rft.show&RFTUUID=2F62B6CE-D37D-4ED4-BC2EA95C7C92019B
 https://www.tenders.nsw.gov.au/wsroc/?event=public.rft.show&RFTUUID=2F62B6CE-D37D-4ED4-BC2EA95C7C92019B
 Invalid Date
 SCADA system is a key element across Sydney Water Treatment plants (i.e., Water Production and Wastewater/Recycled Water/Advanced Wastewater Treatment plants) for managing its daily operations and key processes including plant performance.

 Global Mapper Software Licenses, Maintenance and Support
 https://www.tenders.nsw.gov.au/wsroc/?event=public.rft.show&RFTUUID=0D5988F5-A0AF-BBA6-9B38B85CDDF2D732
 https://www.tenders.nsw.gov.au/wsroc/?event=public.rft.show&RFTUUID=0D5988F5-A0AF-BBA6-9B38B85CDDF2D732
 Invalid Date
 Spatial Services currently holds 12 BlueMarble Global Mapper Standard Network Licenses + maintenance and 3 BlueMarble Global Mapper Pro v25 Network Licenses with associated maintenance.
Only suppliers listed under the ICT Services Scheme for Category M09 are eligible to apply.
 


 Escalation and Alert Management Platform
 https://www.tenders.nsw.gov.au/wsroc/?event=public.rft.show&RFTUUID=9E157B23-9E00-8C4A-99A23CB85053AD18
 https://www.tenders.nsw.gov.au/wsroc/?event=public.rft.show&RFTUUID=9E157B23-9E00-8C4A-99A23CB85053AD18
 Invalid Date
 The purpose of this tender is the procurement of licenses for the escalation platform PagerDuty for the Principal. PagerDuty is required by Revenue NSW and Service NSW and has been in use since 2021 and 2022 respectively as an operations performance solution. The solution PagerDuty gives users access to such as on-call scheduling, alert monitoring, and escalation policies. It also features incident monitoring, which allows them to resolve troubles in their servers, applications, and websites. It has native integration support for over 300 third-party applications, which gives businesses additional benefits such as end-to-end.

 https://www.tenders.nsw.gov.au/wsroc/?event=public.rft.show&RFTUUID=F73E0B61-D63B-85EA-FC762B83DD475564
 Invalid Date
 Transport for NSW invites submission of Proposals for the supply of Contracts Management System to manage Public Transport Contracts post service delivery post award, not throughout the sourcing and/or contract execution stage
 


 HBCF Builder Risk Services (Information Broker)

 https://www.tenders.nsw.gov.au/wsroc/?event=public.rft.show&RFTUUID=F9C4149A-08AC-E841-33067563660BBF8C
 Invalid Date
 This RFP relates to the procurement of Builder Risk Services (Information Broker) for icare Home Building Compensation Fund (HBCF).
 


 Domain-based Messaging, Authentication, Reporting and Conformance (DMARC) reporting tool for all of NSW Government
 https://www.tenders.nsw.gov.au/wsroc/?event=public.rft.show&RFTUUID=FDEB58D1-C999-CBB4-D05670955313C7F7
 https://www.tenders.nsw.gov.au/wsroc/?event=public.rft.show&RFTUUID=FDEB58D1-C999-CBB4-D05670955313C7F7
 Invalid Date
 In 2021, Cyber Security commenced the DMARC project, rolling out DMARC across 11 portfolios, 180 agencies and state organisations, eight state-owned corporations and 128 NSW local councils, protecting more than 21,000 NSW Government domains.
The core objective of this tender is to engage a provider that can provide a DMARC reporting platform to preventthreat actors from abusing NSW Government domains while providing insight into the traffic against these domains through a threat reporting mechanism, and related account management services to Cyber Security NSW
 


 RAA Loan Solution
 https://www.tenders.nsw.gov.au/wsroc/?event=public.rft.show&RFTUUID=D0D314B9-9F65-22C5-E310ED31C6A4B6DB
 https://www.tenders.nsw.gov.au/wsroc/?event=public.rft.show&RFTUUID=D0D314B9-9F65-22C5-E310ED31C6A4B6DB
 Invalid Date
 The Rural Assistance Authority (RAA) is issuing a Request for Tender (RFT) for the procurement and implementation of an off-the-shelf Loan Management Solution. This solution aims to enhance process efficiency, compliance, transparency, and customer experience while aligning with industry standards.
 


 Prequalification Scheme: ICT Services
 /scheme/6B1F91AE-B3CC-0F0E-17267D5EF7BCEB9E
 /scheme/6B1F91AE-B3CC-0F0E-17267D5EF7BCEB9E

 The ICT Services Scheme is mandated for all suppliers who deliver ICT goods and services to the NSW Government.
